column4: Hello, after upgrading to karmic i have a problem with my wireless card (Atheros AR5001 - on an acer aspire one). After leaving the computer for some time without doing anything the card becomes unclaimed and i can make it work again only after a hard reboot. ANY IDEAS???
Weird, I've got the exact same card and hasn't happened to me
and i get the same problem both with network manager and wicd installed
Have you looked through dmesg, any idea there?
Best for you to pastebin whats in /var/log/dmesg
no haven't looked that yet i'll have to wait for the problem to happen so i can see the dmesg
You might have /var/log/dmesg.0 which would be from a previous session
yeap i found it
Good, pastebin, I'll have a look at it..
http://paste.ubuntu.com/392691/ here it is
Nothing bad happened there, Not to sure if it would be caught by dmesg, Have you got anymore dmesg that you could paste bin?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/392697/
http://paste.ubuntu.com/392699/ another
Nope nothing there either, If you have a look at the dmesg, you'll see a number within the brackets. If something happens the numbers would jump from ~20-30 to whenever it happens as thats only boot
http://paste.ubuntu.com/392700/ one more
http://paste.ubuntu.com/392701/ that's the last one i have
Not to sure if pastbin is cutting the file short, but they just contain normal boot up which seems fine
no i think its all there
is there a way to reclaim the card without a hard reboot?
First of all we need to find where the card is dropping to.
i think it has to do with inactivity of the computer, cause the problem comes always after leaving it on but doing nothing on it for some time
